question.text: Necrosis in crops is due to the deficiency of

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></math>

solution.text: Deficiency of different essential elements produces different symptoms like chlorosis, necrosis or death of the tissue. Necrosis or death of the tissue, particularly leaf tissue, is due to deficiency of  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math> .
